ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gexcl2.1 | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |

| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( od ` G ) = ( od ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_oddvds2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( od ` G ) ` x ) || ( # ` X ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3expa | |- ( ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( od ` G ) ` x ) || ( # ` X ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> A. x e. X ( ( od ` G ) ` x ) || ( # ` X ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_hashcl | |- ( X e. Fin -> ( # ` X ) e. NN0 ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( # ` X ) e. NN0 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_nn0zd | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( # ` X ) e. ZZ ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_gexdvds2 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( # ` X ) e. ZZ ) -> ( E || ( # ` X ) <-> A. x e. X ( ( od ` G ) ` x ) || ( # ` X ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( E || ( # ` X ) <-> A. x e. X ( ( od ` G ) ` x ) || ( # ` X ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. Fin ) -> E || ( # ` X ) ) |
